segments.text: Did everyone fill out their entry permits ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . The videographer has already started filming my parents trying to speak English with the flight attendants .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Speaking of flight attendants , they keep smiling at me . I wonder why ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It'll be the year 2000 ! The flight attendants are coming over here . They're carrying bottles of champagne !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's time to make our wedding wish come true ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You mean get married now ? On the plane ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why not ? I've got the rings ready .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know what to say , Jack !
segments.speaker: S2
